Da Lat.title: Da Lat
Da Lat.byline: During the colonial era, Da Lat (Đà Lạt), also Dalat, in the South Central Highlands of Vietnam, was the playground of the French, who built villas in the clear mountain air to escape the heat and humidity of the plains and coastal areas.

Da Nang.title: Da Nang
Da Nang.byline: Da Nang (Đà Nẵng) is Vietnam's fifth largest city.
